title: aDaikkalam enrunnai
sahitya:
aDaikkalam enrunnai aDaiyum ennaiyenru kaDai tETrik-karuNai kATTiDuvAi murugA


anupallavi

  aDi paNindu pOTri abhayam abhayamenru aDikkaDi irandun aruLaip-peravE


caraNam    orumurai unai uLam urughak-karudinAlum krpai purindiDum karuNAkaranE
pan murai iduvarai pAvi nAn kadariyum innum irangAmal iruppadum sariyO
